name: ScriptEditorWindow
description: ScriptEditorWindow is a powerful tool inside Unity that provides a convenient environment for writing and debugging scripts in C# directly in the Unity editor.

name: Localization 1.0
description: Localization Asset 1.0 for Unity provides a simple and efficient way to localize your project into multiple languages, including support for Text Mesh Pro. Supported languages are: Russian, English, Traditional Chinese, European Portuguese, and Brazilian Portuguese. The asset allows easy management of text strings within Text Mesh Pro components, switching languages during gameplay, and provides a clean and intuitive interface for editing translations. With Localization 1.0, you can create multilingual games and applications accessible to a wider audience, leveraging the capabilities of Text Mesh Pro for high-quality text rendering.
